org.nd4j.parameterserver.updater

Class SynchronousParameterUpdater

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nd4j.parameterserver.updater.BaseParameterUpdater
      • org.nd4j.parameterserver.updater.SynchronousParameterUpdater
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ParameterServerUpdater

    public class SynchronousParameterUpdater
extends BaseParameterUpdater
    Adds the 2 arrays together, synchronizing when all updates have been collected.
